references.reason: This paper introduces the VQ-VAE framework, which is the foundation for many neural audio codecs, including the FocalCodec presented in this work.
This paper is a state-of-the-art acoustic codec that achieves high-quality reconstruction at lower bitrates, which serves as a strong baseline for comparison in the current work.

references.paper_title: WavLM: Large-scale self-supervised pre-training for full stack speech processing
references.reason: This paper introduces WavLM, a large self-supervised speech model used in the FocalCodec architecture for extracting both acoustic and semantic features for speech processing.

references.paper_title: HiFi-GAN: generative adversarial networks for efficient and high fidelity speech synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces the HiFi-GAN vocoder used in the FocalCodec decoder for high-quality speech resynthesis.
This paper introduces the focal modulation architecture, which is a core component of the FocalCodec compressor and decompressor, providing efficient and scalable speech representation learning.
